participant_1.background:
I have an odd schedule since I'm a night owl, but I still get my work done.
i love to listen to religious music.
I sometimes spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it.
i work in it.
I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments.

participant_2.background:
I loved riding horses with my father when I was a child.
I enjoy reading my favorite book, Anne of Green Gables, on the weekend.
I want to learn more about the science behind how gummy worms are made.
i was a navy brat and have attended 16 schools in 12 years.
i still call my ex boyfriend on his birthday because birthdays are special.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Good! I'm a night owl, so I'm just getting started on my day. How about you?
I love to sleep in, so I'm just getting up. What do you do for a living?
I work in theater, which is why I have to keep my schedule flexible. What about you?
I've been a navy brat my whole life, so I've moved around a lot. I enjoy reading my favorite book, Anne of Green Gables, on the weekends.
I love to read too! My favorite book is "The Great Gatsby". Have you heard of it?
Yes! I love that book too. I have read it several times. I also like to learn more about the science behind how gummy worms are made.
That's an interesting interest! I have never thought about that before.
It's fascinating! I think it's so cool how they make them so small and chewy.
Me too! It's amazing what science can do.
I agree! It's amazing how much we've learned about the world in just a few hundred years.
I know, right? It's crazy to think about how much we've advanced in such a short time.
It's definitely something to be thankful for
